item.description:
In honor of National Poetry Month, DigBoston is putting poetry back into the hands of the people.

On April 29th, you’re invited to join [Dig poetess Emily Hopkins] and Toni Bee, Poet Populist of Cambridge, at OBERON for a remedy to the open poetic forum dearth. Featured poets will include Matt Ganem, Richard Pfaff, Scott Krave, Phillipe Martin Chatelain of InParentheses Magazine (http://inparenthesesmag.com/), Samantha Milowsky from Amethyst Arsenic (http://www.amethystarsenic.com/), and more. 

Including you, since there’ll be an open mic segment at the end so that aspiring poets get to stand on the same stage as the established voices. 

When: Monday April 29th
Where: OBERON (@clubOBERON)
And don’t worry: the bar will be serving a magical liquid that gives you the courage to do shit like this. [booze]

So come on. Get your sweaty palms around that mic and hold on until security comes.

FULL PREVIEW HERE! http://ow.ly/km3TG


7:30PM/ALL AGES/FREE, RSVP: http://ow.ly/km3XA
item.name: The Dig's Poetry Night at Oberon
